## Loading and preprocessing the data

```{r loaddata, echo=TRUE}
library("data.table")
library(ggplot2)
fileUrl <- "https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/repdata%2Fdata%2Factivity.zip"
download.file(fileUrl, destfile = paste0(getwd(), '/activity.zip'), method = "curl")
unzip("activity.zip")
```
